metadata.title: CVE-2023-4134 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
[Input: cyttsp4_core - change del_timer_sync() to timer_shutdown_sync()]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-4134` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-100-generic - 5.15.0-100.110
linux-image-5.15.0-100-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-100.110
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-100-generic - 5.15.0-100.110
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-100-generic-64k - 5.15.0-100.110
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-100.110').
linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2, was needs-triage').
linux-kvm package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1052.57').
